meanings.definition: A person or animal that straggles or lags behind.
meanings.sent1: The stragglier in the group was the slowest runner.
meanings.sent2: The little puppy was the stragglier of the litter.
meanings.sent3: The stragglier duck waddled along comically behind the rest of the flock.
meanings.sent4: The stragglier of the sheep seemed to have a mind of its own, wandering off from the herd.
meanings.sent5: The stragglier squirrel struggled to keep up with its nimble companions.

meanings.definition: To move or spread out in a scattered or irregular way.
meanings.sent1: The leaves stragglier across the ground after the wind blew them off the tree.
meanings.sent2: The hikers began to stragglier as they reached the top of the steep hill.
meanings.sent3: The ants seemed to stragglier aimlessly after the sugar cube fell and broke into pieces.
meanings.sent4: The stars stragglier across the night sky, creating a beautiful display.
meanings.sent5: The paintbrush stragglier streaks of color on the canvas, creating a unique pattern.
